chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> IR_equivalent [IRI k; IRI k'; IRO k; IRO k'] [IRI k'; IRO k'; IRI k; IRO k]

Premises:
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
Inductive IR_equivalent : list IR -> list IR -> Prop := IR_equiv_nil : IR_equivalent [] [] | IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments IR_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
IR_equiv_eg1 : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> IR_equivalent [IRI k; IRI k'; IRO k; IRO k'] [IRI k; IRO k; IRI k'; IRO k']
good_move = fun x y : IR => (forall k k' : K, ~ (x = IRO k /\ y = IRI k')) /\ (forall k : K, ~ (x = IRI k /\ y = IRO k)) /\ (forall k : K, ~ (x = IRI k /\ y = IRU k)) : IR -> IR -> Prop
acknowledge_all_ops_func_defn : forall (x : op) (l : list op) (target : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops_func (x :: l) target = match x with | I k => if acknowledged_op_dec k l then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else acknowledge_all_ops_func l target | O k => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target end
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
acknowledge_all_ops_func = fix acknowledge_all_ops_func (l : list op) (target : list IR) {struct l} : list IR := match l with | [] => [] | I k :: xs => if acknowledged_op_dec k xs then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target | O k :: xs => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target end : list op -> list IR -> list IR Arguments acknowledge_all_ops_func (_ _)%list_scope
assoc_set : forall K V : Type, (forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (K * V) -> K -> V -> list (K * V)
IR_ind : forall P : IR -> Prop, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
IR_sind : forall P : IR -> SProp, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
IR_rect : forall P : IR -> Type, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
IR_rec : forall P : IR -> Set, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_ext : forall (l : list op) (t t' : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t -> In (IRU k) t') -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t' -> In (IRU k) t) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l t = acknowledge_all_ops_func l t'
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope
do_reboot : do_name -> (file_name -> option Core.IOStreamWriter.in_channel) -> data * list (disk_op file_name) where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?DiskOpFailureParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
acknowledge_all_ops_was_in : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l
AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
reboot : data -> data where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P0] ?FailureParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- FailureParams ?P]
FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)
mkNetwork : list packet -> (name -> data) -> network where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
nwdoState : do_network -> do_name -> data where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0]
nwState : network -> name -> data where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
mkdoNetwork : list do_packet -> (do_name -> data) -> (do_name -> do_disk file_name) -> do_network where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0]
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0

```coq
intros k k' H.
rewrite <- IR_equiv_eg1 with (k:=k) (k':=k').
auto.
Qed.```
